sentences.sContent: She resigned from the government last week.
sentences.sCn: 上星期她辞去了政府部门的工作。

sentences.sContent: Josh resigned himself to the long walk home.
sentences.sCn: 乔希只好走很长的路回家。

remMethod.val: re(一再)+sign(标记； 签名)→再度签名是辞职的时候→辞去， 辞职

words.tran: 顺从的；已辞职的；己放弃的

trans.tranCn: 辞去,辞职；使听从(于),使顺从
trans.tranOther: to officially announce that you have decided to leave your job or an organization
